data.title: Yekaterinburg weather and climate in 2024
data.text:
Weather overview

Yekaterinburg (Russia) is a place with a cold continental climate. Temperatures during the day are in the range from -9Â Â°CÂ (15Â Â°F) in January to 24Â Â°CÂ (75Â Â°F) in July. Temperatures during the night go from -16Â Â°CÂ (3Â Â°F) in January to 14Â Â°CÂ (56Â Â°F) in July. The least rainy month in Yekaterinburg is February with its 6Â days of rain, the rainiest month is August, when it rains 12Â days.

January weather

The minimum of the night temperature is observable, the value of this measure is -16Â Â°CÂ (3Â Â°F) in Yekaterinburg, and the day temperature reaches its minimum too, with its value of -9Â Â°CÂ (15Â Â°F). The number of sun hours (without clouds) starts to rise in this month. The humidity is on its maximum in January.

February weather

The day temperature starts to rise, its value is -7Â Â°CÂ (19Â Â°F) in Yekaterinburg, and the night temperature rise's start could be observed too, with its value being -15Â Â°CÂ (4Â Â°F). The minimum of the rainfall amount can be noticed, with its value of 19Â mmÂ (0.74Â in), and the minimum of the number of rainy days is observable as well in February. The dry season slowly starts. The number of sun hours (without clouds) rises similarly to the previous month, its value is 3Â hours.

March weather

The day temperature continues to rise, the value of this measure is 1Â Â°CÂ (33Â Â°F) in Yekaterinburg, and the night temperature continues to rise too, the value of this measure is -8Â Â°CÂ (17Â Â°F). The rise of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed, its value is 5Â hours. There is pending dry season.

April weather

The number of rainy days starts to rise, with its value of 7Â days in Yekaterinburg, and the rainfall amount starts to rise too, its value is 29Â mmÂ (1.14Â in). The rise of the day temperature can be observed, the value of this measure is 9Â Â°CÂ (48Â Â°F), and the night temperature rises similarly to the previous month as well, its value is -1Â Â°CÂ (30Â Â°F). The dry season is close to its peak. The number of sun hours (without clouds) continues to rise, with its value being 7Â hours.

May weather

The number of rainy days rises similarly to the previous month, with its value of 9Â days in Yekaterinburg, and the rainfall amount continues to rise too, with its value being 48Â mmÂ (1.90Â in). The day temperature continues to rise, and the night temperature continues to rise too, its value is 5Â Â°CÂ (41Â Â°F). The rise of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed. The humidity is on its minimum.

June weather

The tourist season is at its beginning in Yekaterinburg. The rise of the day temperature can be observed, with its value of 22Â Â°CÂ (72Â Â°F), and the rise of the night temperature can be observed as well, with its value of 11Â Â°CÂ (52Â Â°F). The rise of the number of rainy days can be observed, its value is 11Â days, and the rainfall amount continues to rise too, its value is 73Â mmÂ (2.89Â in). The number of sun hours (without clouds) is on its maximum, with its value of 9Â hours.

July weather

There is pending tourist season in Yekaterinburg. The number of rainy days continues to rise, while the rainfall amount is on its maximum in July. The day temperature is on its maximum, and the maximum of the night temperature is observable too, with its value of 14Â Â°CÂ (56Â Â°F). The minimum of the wind speed can be noticed, with its value of 2.

August weather

The day temperature descent's start could be observed, with its value of 21Â Â°CÂ (70Â Â°F) in Yekaterinburg, and the night temperature descent's start could be observed too, with its value being 11Â Â°CÂ (51Â Â°F). The tourist season continues this month. The number of rainy days reaches its maximum, its value is 12Â days, while the rainfall amount starts to descent, the value of this measure is 70Â mmÂ (2.76Â in). The number of sun hours (without clouds) continues to descent, with its value being 7Â hours.

September weather

The number of rainy days descent's start could be observed, with its value of 10Â days in Yekaterinburg, while the rainfall amount continues to descent, with its value being 55Â mmÂ (2.18Â in). The descent of the day temperature can be observed, with its value of 14Â Â°CÂ (57Â Â°F), and the night temperature descents similarly to the previous month as well, with its value of 5Â Â°CÂ (42Â Â°F). The number of sun hours (without clouds) continues to descent, with its value of 5Â hours.

October weather

The day temperature descents similarly to the previous month, with its value being 6Â Â°CÂ (43Â Â°F) in Yekaterinburg, and the night temperature descents similarly to the previous month too, its value is 0Â Â°CÂ (32Â Â°F). The rainfall amount continues to descent, the value of this measure is 41Â mmÂ (1.62Â in). The descent of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed, with its value being 3Â hours.

November weather

The day temperature continues to descent, with its value being -3Â Â°CÂ (27Â Â°F) in Yekaterinburg, and the descent of the night temperature can be observed too. The number of rainy days starts to descent, the value of this measure is 9Â days, while the rainfall amount descents similarly to the previous month, the value of this measure is 32Â mmÂ (1.26Â in). The descent of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed, the value of this measure is 2Â hours. The maximum of the wind speed is observable, its value is 3.

December weather

The number of rainy days continues to descent, the value of this measure is 8Â days in Yekaterinburg, and the descent of the rainfall amount can be observed too, with its value of 26Â mmÂ (1.04Â in). The day temperature descents similarly to the previous month, its value is -8Â Â°CÂ (17Â Â°F), and the night temperature continues to descent as well, with its value being -14Â Â°CÂ (6Â Â°F). The minimum of the number of sun hours (without clouds) is observable in December. The day length is on its minimum in December.
